ratings.note: INVESTMENT GRADE but DOWNGRADED from Baa2 to Baa3 (Aug 2025). Negative outlook due to severe earnings deterioration.

overview.business_description: Paperboard manufacturer supplying premium fresh fibre paperboards primarily for packaging and food service industries. Operates through direct sales with focus on sustainable packaging solutions. Part of Metsä Group (Metsäliitto Cooperative).
business_positives: Low distress score of 9 - performing credit
overview.fatal_flaw: EBITDA COLLAPSED -79% from $383m (2022) to $79m (LTM). 3Q25 EBITDA was NEGATIVE (EUR -18.2m loss). Net leverage exploded from 0.2x to 5.0x. Net income -$87m (loss). EBITDA margin collapsed from 14.4% to 3.7%. Downgraded to Baa3 with negative outlook. Paperboard industry in severe cyclical downturn.
overview.ownership: Public - Helsinki Stock Exchange (METSB). Majority owned by Metsäliitto Cooperative (184m shares). Other shareholders include Varma Pension, Ilmarinen, Norges Bank.
overview.recent_news: 3Q25 comparable EBITDA LOSS reaches EUR 18.2m (Oct 2025). Downgraded to Baa3 from Baa2 (Aug 2025). 2Q25 comparable EBITDA falls 76.8% YoY to EUR 6.1m (Aug 2025). Outlook changed to negative (May 2025). Considers green unsecured notes issuance (May 2025). 1Q25 EBITDA declines 11.6% YoY (Apr 2025).

quick_assessment.note: IG rated but EBITDA collapsed. Leverage exploded from 0.2x to 5.0x.

key_ratios.note: CRITICAL: Leverage exploded from 0.2x (2022) to 5.0x due to EBITDA collapse, not debt increase. Margin collapsed 14.4%→3.7%.

trend_analysis.trend_summary: CATASTROPHIC EBITDA COLLAPSE: -79% from $383m (2022) to $79m (LTM). 3Q25 EBITDA was NEGATIVE. Net leverage exploded 0.2x→5.0x. Margins crushed 14.4%→3.7%. Net income from +$439m profit to -$87m loss.

maturity_schedule.note: Sep 2027 maturity ($299m) is key focus. Light maturity profile.

credit_opinion.summary: Metsä Board is an INVESTMENT GRADE credit (Baa3/BBB-) with low distress score (9), but fundamentals have DETERIORATED CATASTROPHICALLY. EBITDA collapsed -79% from $383m (2022) to $79m (LTM), with 3Q25 showing an EBITDA LOSS. Net leverage exploded from 0.2x to 5.0x due to earnings collapse, not debt increase. Moody's downgraded to Baa3 with negative outlook (Aug 2025). While bonds trade near par (98-99) reflecting IG rating and strong parent support from Metsäliitto Cooperative, the fundamental trajectory is alarming. Paperboard industry in severe cyclical downturn. At risk of further downgrades if EBITDA doesn't recover.
key_risks: Could lose IG status if EBITDA doesn't recover
